title: Cover, ca. 1920
medium:
Medium: linen
Technique: foundation: plain weave (possibly handwoven).  Stitches: chain, knot-like stitch using a single overcast and a single buttonhole, knot-like stitch using two buttonhole stitches
description: Rectangular cover made up of small embroidered squares of two types, each a floral pattern using tan linen, 15 cm [6"] square.  Squares joined by needlework overhand knot stitch.  Edges of panel decorated with needle made bars using a large needle made and knotted tassel attached to each corner.

tombstone.epitaph:
Cover, ca. 1920.Medium: linen
Technique: foundation: plain weave (possibly handwoven).  Stitches: chain, knot-like stitch using a single overcast and a single buttonhole, knot-like stitch using two buttonhole stitches. 1979-66-2.
